location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a request by the Political Resident, Persian Gulf, for information on the Savings Scheme provided for officers in the British Army, in order to compare it to the Defence Services Officersâ€™ Provident Fund offered by the Government of India. The file also contains a cover letter from the Commonwealth Relations Office forwarding the request on to the Foreign Office.
